title: Instructional Design Program for Enhancing Culture-Based Art Criticism Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of art history and critical theory, with experience in cultural context analysis
context.additional_context: An advanced learning course for current practitioners, featuring an interactive structure centered on asynchronous discussions and assignment submissions

learning_goals: Analyze artworks reflecting diverse cultural backgrounds and articulate critical perspectives with over 80% accuracy
Produce cultural critique learning materials following design principles based on the Dick and Carey instructional model
Identify and suggest improvements for cultural implications in critique texts through peer evaluation at least three times
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
